install.name: YouTube
install.author: Christopher Smoak
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2005 - 2011 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
install.description: This module allows to display a youtube feed

param.name: lazy
param.label: Lazy Loading
param.description: Use javascript to dynamically load the Youtube feed to the page. Displays no content without javascript. Otherwise use normal PHP method and using caching to improve performance.

param.name: type
param.label: Youtube Feed Type
param.description: Select the type of Youtube Feed (Playlist, User Channel, or by Search Term)

param.name: q
param.label: Playlist ID, User Channel, or Search Term
param.description: Enter either a Youtube playlist id, Youtube user channel, or a search term that you would like to be parsed.

param.name: alttitle
param.label: Alternative Title
param.description: Title to be displayed instead of the Youtube parsed title.

param.name: altdesc
param.label: Alternative Description
param.description: Description to be displayed instead of the Youtube parsed description.

param.name: altimage
param.label: Alternative Logo
param.description: Logo to be displayed instead of the Youtube logo.

param.name: videos
param.label: Number of Videos
param.description: Enter number of videos to display.

param.name: link
param.label: Show View More link
param.description: Show the link to all videos

param.name: altlink
param.label: Alternative Link
param.description: Link to be displayed instead of the Youtube parsed link.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time in minutes before the module is re-cached.
